titles.title: To direct the Secretary of Transportation to convey to the Montauk Historical Society Light Station located at Montauk, New York.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

committee.name: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Coast Guard and Navigation.

committee.name: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries

action.text: Text of Measure Incorporated into H.R.4422.

bill.summary: 6/21/1994--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of Transportation to convey all right, title, and interest of the United States in Light Station Montauk Point, New York, to the Montauk Historical Association, New York.
